content: What ancient civilization built the Great Pyramid of Giza, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World?

The Great Pyramid of Giza was built by the ancient Egyptians. It is one of the most iconic structures from antiquity and stands as a testament to the engineering prowess of the civilization that constructed it. The pyramid is believed to have been built as a tomb for Pharaoh Khufu around 2560-2540 BC during the Fourth Dynasty of the Old Kingdom period.
